rules: 🔹**1 | Respect Everyone**
🟢 Be respectful to everyone. No insults, discrimination, harassment, or toxic behavior.
🚫 Avoid sensitive topics (politics, religion, etc.) to maintain a friendly environment.
🔹 **2 | Advertising & Spam**
🚫 No unauthorized advertising (Discord servers, YouTube, services, etc.).
⛔ Spamming messages, emojis, mentions, or links is strictly prohibited.
🔹 **3 | Inappropriate Content**
❌ No posting of NSFW, gore, hateful, or shocking content.
🔞 Avoid inappropriate usernames & avatars.
🔹 **4 | Bot & Command Usage**
📌 Post in the correct channels to keep the server organized.
🔊 Follow voice chat rules: No excessive noise, unauthorized music, or soundboard abuse.
🔹 **5 | Security & Privacy**
🤖 Use bot commands only in designated bot channels.
❌ Do not spam commands to prevent flooding.
🔹 **6 | Sanctions & Moderation**
🔒 Do not share personal information or others' information without consent.
🕵️‍♂️ Scams & phishing attempts will result in an immediate ban.
### **🔔 Breaking the rules will lead to warnings, mutes, kicks, or bans, depending on severity.**
### 📩 Need help? Open a support ticket.

messages.leaveMessage: Thanks for being part of our community! 👋
messages.rulesFooter: Click the button below to accept the rules and gain access to the server.
